remarks: Weak version (principal instance) of ~ ax-13 .  (Because ` y ` and ` z ` don't need to be distinct, this actually bundles the principal instance and the degenerate instance ` ( -. x = y -> ( y = y -> A. x y = y ) ) ` .)  Uses only Tarski's FOL axiom schemes.  The proof is trivial but is included to complete the set ~ ax10w , ~ ax11w , and ~ ax12w .  (Contributed by NM, 10-Apr-2017.)
statement:
ax13w $p |- ( -. x = y -> ( y = z -> A. x y = z ) ) $.
$d x y $.
$d x z $.
